summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Via Sacra interactive website. Backend APIs working correctly (6/7 tests passed), frontend fully functional with proper navigation, visual map, and user experience. All core features implemented successfully.

minor_issues.issue: OPTIONS request returns 405 instead of proper CORS headers
minor_issues.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, only CORS preflight

passed_tests: Intro page loading and content display
Via Sacra page elements (map, station card, navigation)
Visual map with correct colors (purple, gold, gray)
Complete user journey (Intro → Stations → Final → Home)
